title: Birds of our storybooks
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Children's poetry - Film and video adaptations
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: Birds which children encounter in their stories and texts are observed in their natural habitats and as they appear in book illustrations. Birds included are the robin, cardinal, crow, owl, sparrow, wren, woodpecker, jay and seagull. Their characteristics - colouring, song and habits are integrated with poems and stories at the primary level.
